body.name: linzy Toys 16" Educational Doll/Adorable Plush Doll Comes with a Removable Outfit Packed with Closures-Perfect for Testing a Little One's Problem Solving and Motor Skills
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery February 27 - 29 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: INTERACTIVE: Adorable plush Doll comes with clad, a removable outfit packed with closures-perfect for testing a little one's growing problem solving and motor skills.

TODDLER FRIENDLY TODDLER FRIENDLY: Educational Doll comes with buttons, zippers, self stick tabs, buckles and laces; All accessories are embroidered and safely sewn onto doll to ensure safety for children during play time.

LEARN INDEPENDENT SKILLS: Your little one will Learn to dress, tie their shoe and attach velcro. This Educational Doll works great with everyone who is looking to relearn motor skills due to age and for new development.
FUN TO PLAY & LEARN: Kids will love to play and develop skills with this Educational Doll. It is beautifully designed with bright colors, and patterns that all kids love!

ABSOLUTELY SAFE AND EASY TO CARE: Linzy Toys is focused on providing your family with products that will become some of your favorite memorabilia and last for a lifetime. All our plush dolls meet or exceed the ASTM F963 & CPSIA Safety Standards, that come with rigorous quality controls. To care for her, simply spot-clean the desired area, and leave flat to dry.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: "Discover Endless Learning Possibilities with the Linzy Toys 16" Educational Doll - A Fun and Educational Companion for Children" The Linzy Toys 16" Educational Doll is not just a regular plush doll—it's a gateway to endless learning possibilities! This adorable doll comes with a removable outfit packed with various closures, such as buttons, snaps, and zippers. By playing with these closures, children can enhance their problem-solving skills and develop their fine motor abilities. This doll is perfect for engaging young minds and making learning enjoyable. "Engage Your Child's Imagination and Skills with the Linzy Toys 16" Educational Doll - A Playmate That Boosts Cognitive Development" Foster your child's imagination and cognitive development with the Linzy Toys 16" Educational Doll. This lovable plush doll not only provides hours of fun but also offers valuable learning opportunities. With its removable outfit packed with closures, children can practice their dexterity and problem-solving abilities. By mastering the art of opening and closing buttons, snaps, and zippers, children develop crucial skills that can benefit them in various aspects of their lives. "Enhance Learning Through Play with the Linzy Toys 16" Educational Doll - A Perfect Blend of Fun and Education" The Linzy Toys 16" Educational Doll is designed to be the perfect blend of fun and education. With its removable outfit packed with closures, this plush doll engages children in hands-on learning experiences. Through play, children can improve their fine motor skills, hand-eye coordination, and problem-solving abilities. Whether they're dressing and undressing the doll or experimenting with different closures, this educational toy offers a world of exploration and growth for young minds.

"Unleash Your Child's Creativity with the Linzy Toys 16" Educational Doll - Explore Multiple Closures for Skill-Building Fun!" Get ready for an exciting adventure of skill-building fun with the Linzy Toys 16" Educational Doll! This adorable plush doll comes with a removable outfit that features a variety of closures to explore. From zippers and buckles to sewed buttons, shoelaces, and velcro straps, your child will have a blast mastering each closure while unleashing their creativity. Through engaging play, they'll enhance their fine motor skills, hand-eye coordination, and problem-solving abilities. The Linzy Toys 16" Educational Doll is the perfect companion for endless hours of imaginative play and skill development.

reviews.reviewText: I am so pleased at this sweet dolly that I am actually taking a couple minutes to give it a review. She is a nice size and well-made. Soft and cuddly and all her limbs and hair move and swing so adorably. My granddaughters will love to play with her when they come to Gigi's house!
